Protocols/QredoVaultObserver.html#/c:obj.name: -qredoVault:didReceiveVaultItemMetadata:
Protocols/QredoVaultObserver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Invoked when a new item is added to the Vault on this or another device

Protocols/QredoRendezvousObserver.html#/.abstract: Invoked when this Rendezvous is responded to

Protocols/QredoConversationObserver.html.name: -qredoConversation:didReceiveNewMessage:
Protocols/QredoConversationObserver.html.abstract: Invoked when a new message is received in the Conversation.

Protocols/QredoConversationObserver.html.name: -qredoConversationOtherPartyHasLeft:
Protocols/QredoConversationObserver.html.abstract: Invoked when the other party to the Conversation leaves as a result of calling deleteConversationWithCompletionHandler

Protocols/QredoConversationObserver.html.name: QredoConversationObserver
Protocols/QredoConversationObserver.html.abstract: The protocol that must implemented by the object that listens for new messages received within a QredoConversation

Protocols/QredoRendezvousObserver.html.name: QredoRendezvousObserver
Protocols/QredoRendezvousObserver.html.abstract: The protocol that must implemented by the object that listens for new messages received within a QredoConversation

Protocols/QredoVaultObserver.html.name: QredoVaultObserver
Protocols/QredoVaultObserver.html.abstract: The protocol that must implemented by the object that listens for new items added to the Vault

Enums/QredoLogLevel.html#/c:@E@QredoLogL.name: QredoLogLevelInfo
Enums/QredoLogLevel.html#/c:@E@QredoLogL.abstract: Log messages with QredoLogInfo. This will report each Qredo API call

Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html#/c:.name: QREDO_RED
Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html#/c:.abstract: Neither party has confirmed their Conversationpublic key fingerprint

Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html#/c:.name: QREDO_AMBER
Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html#/c:.abstract: Only one party has confirmed their Conversation public key fingerprint

Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html#/c:.name: QREDO_GREEN
Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html#/c:.abstract: Both parties have confirmed their Conversation public key fingerprints. The Conversation is fully authenticated

Enums/QredoSecurityLevel.html#/c:@E@Qred.name: QREDO_MEDIUM_SECURITY
Enums/QredoSecurityLevel.html#/c:@E@Qred.abstract: 6 bits tags that are represented by a 12 character hex string

Enums/QredoSecurityLevel.html#/c:@E@Qred.name: QREDO_HIGH_SECURITY
Enums/QredoSecurityLevel.html#/c:@E@Qred.abstract: 32 bit tags that are represented by a 64 character hex string

Enums/QredoSecurityLevel.html.name: QredoSecurityLevel
Enums/QredoSecurityLevel.html.abstract: The security level used for a Rendezvous tag created with createAnonymousRendezvousWithTagType

Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html.name: QredoAuthenticationStatus
Enums/QredoAuthenticationStatus.html.abstract: Represents the authentication status of a Conversation.

Classes/QredoVault.html#/c:objc(cs)Qredo.abstract: Goes through the items in this Vault at the point after the specified highwatermark and calls the specified code block on each one. Iterates through all versions of all items in the Vault, including deleted items.

Classes/QredoUtils.html#/c:objc(cs)Qredo.abstract: Non RFC1751 method to convert between key to a readable string.

Classes/QredoRendezvous.html#/c:objc(cs).name: unlimitedResponses
Classes/QredoRendezvous.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Set to YES if the Rendezvous accepts multiple responses, otherwise only one response will be accepted before the Rendezvous expires

Classes/QredoRendezvous.html#/c:objc(cs).name: expiresAt
Classes/QredoRendezvous.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: The date and time at which the Rendezvous expires.

Classes/QredoConversationMessage.html#/c.abstract: Called to initialise the message with the value and metadata

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.name: highWatermark
Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: The current highwatermark for this Conversation. This is used when enumerating QredoConversationMessages.

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.name: -resetHighWatermark
Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Resets the highwatermark to the start. Enumerating QredoConversationMessages will start from the beginning of the QredoConversation.

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Send the specified message to the other party in the Conversation

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.name: -removeConversationObserver:
Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Stop listening for messages received in the Conversation and delete the observer object.

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.name: -otherPartyHasMyFingerPrint:
Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Call if the other party in the Conversation confirms that they have the fingerprint to your Conversation public key

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.name: -iHaveRemoteFingerPrint:
Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Call this if the other party to the Conversation confirms that you have their fingerprint

Classes/QredoConversation.html#/c:objc(c.name: -showRemoteFingerPrint

Classes/QredoConversationMetadata.html#/.name: summaryValues

Classes/QredoConversationHighWatermark.h.name: -isLaterThan:

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: +initializeFromUserDefaultCredentialsInAppGroup:withCompletionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Init QredoClient from the values stored in the Keychain/UserDefaults - please see saveCredentialsInKeychain section below for security implications

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -closeSession
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Closes the connection to Qredo. Call this when you no longer require Qredo services.

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -isClosed
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: The status of the Qredo connection

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Creates an anonymous rendezvous and generates a random tag with the specified security level

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -createAnonymousRendezvousWithTagType:duration:unlimitedResponses:summaryValues:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Creates an anonymous rendezvous and generates a random tag with the specified security level. The duration and response count will be set to the values specified

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -enumerateRendezvousWithBlock:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Enumerates through all the Rendezvous created by the current app user passing the QredoRendezvousMetadata for each one.

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -fetchRendezvousWithTag:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Returns the QredoRendezvous represented by the specified tag.

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -fetchRendezvousWithRef:completionHandler:

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -fetchRendezvousWithMetadata:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Returns the QredoRendezvous with the specified QredoRendezvousMetadata

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -respondWithTag:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Respond to the Rendezvous with the specified tag. A secure QredoConversation will automatically be created between the creator and responder which you can then use to send and receive QredoConversationMessage objects

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -activateRendezvousWithRef:duration:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Activates an existing Rendezvous.

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -deactivateRendezvousWithRef:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Deactivates a Rendezvous.

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -enumerateConversationsWithBlock:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Enumerates through all Conversations and sends back the QredoConversationMetadata for each one

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -fetchConversationWithRef:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Returns the QredoConversation referenced by the specified QredoConversationRef

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -deleteConversationWithRef:completionHandler:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: This function is not currently implemented

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -defaultVault
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Returns an object used to access the app user’s Vault.

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: +randomStringWithLength:
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Helper method to generate a random string of specified length using only chars from abcdefghjklmnpqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZ123456789

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -saveCredentialsInKeychain
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Store the QredoClient credentials into the iOS Keychain - this is essential if you need an iOS extension such as a Push Notification extension to decrypt incoming messages without

Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.name: -saveCredentialsInUserDefaults
Classes/QredoClient.html#/c:objc(cs)Qred.abstract: Store the QredoClient credentials into the iOS UserDefaults dictionary - this is essential if you need an iOS extension such as a Push Notification extension to decrypt incoming messages without

Classes/QredoClient.html.name: QredoClient
Classes/QredoClient.html.abstract: Used to manage connections to Qredo and create, manage and respond to Rendezvous.

Classes/QredoConversationHighWatermark.h.name: QredoConversationHighWatermark
Classes/QredoConversationHighWatermark.h.abstract: The highwater mark is the marker from which to retrieve messages in a Conversation. Objects of this class are not created directly

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)QredoConversatio.name: QredoConversationRef
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)QredoConversatio.abstract: Used to refer to a specific QredoConversation. Not created directly. Developers can find extract this value from the QredoConversationMetadata.

Classes/QredoConversationMetadata.html.name: QredoConversationMetadata
Classes/QredoConversationMetadata.html.abstract: Contains information about a QredoConversation. Accessed from QredoConversation.metadata and returned by enumerateConversationsWithBlock

Classes/QredoConversation.html.name: QredoConversation
Classes/QredoConversation.html.abstract: Represents a secure channel of communication between two app users

Classes/QredoConversationMessage.html.name: QredoConversationMessage
Classes/QredoConversationMessage.html.abstract: Represents a Conversation message. Contains the message itself, together with metadata

Classes/QredoPushMessage.html.name: QredoPushMessage
Classes/QredoPushMessage.html.abstract: Encapsulates the decoding of incoming Apple Push Notifications into Qredo Objects representing the decrypted message and its parent (QredoConversation)

Classes/QredoQUID.html.name: QredoQUID
Classes/QredoQUID.html.abstract: Used to represent ConversationIDs and other values used by the SDK.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)QredoRendezvousR.name: QredoRendezvousRef
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)QredoRendezvousR.abstract: Used to retrieve, activate and deactivate a particular Rendezvous.

Classes/QredoRendezvousMetadata.html.name: QredoRendezvousMetadata
Classes/QredoRendezvousMetadata.html.abstract: Contains information about a previously created Rendezvous.

Classes/QredoUtils.html.name: QredoUtils
Classes/QredoUtils.html.abstract: A collection of utility functions for converting between keys, hex data strings and readable words.

Classes/QredoSecureChannel.html.name: QredoSecureChannel
Classes/QredoSecureChannel.html.abstract: Helper Class to faciliate the easy creation of Diffie Hellman Channels. Use for exchanging Rendezvous over an insecure communciations channel.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)QredoVaultHighWa.name: QredoVaultHighWatermark
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)QredoVaultHighWa.abstract: Used to represent the state of the Vault. This is the mark to search from when enumerating VaultItems

Classes/QredoVaultItemDescriptor.html.name: QredoVaultItemDescriptor
Classes/QredoVaultItemDescriptor.html.abstract: Identifies a specific version of a vault item.

Classes/QredoVaultItemMetadata.html.name: QredoVaultItemMetadata
Classes/QredoVaultItemMetadata.html.abstract: Information about a vault item. These properties are read only.

Classes/QredoVaultItem.html.name: QredoVaultItem
Classes/QredoVaultItem.html.abstract: Represents a VaultItem. Contains properties for the vault item’s data and metadata

Classes/QredoVault.html.name: QredoVault
Classes/QredoVault.html.abstract: Contains the methods to add, retrieve, search for and delete items in a Qredo Vault.
